column1: I booked tickets from Israel to India through Travelgenio. Given the CoronaVirus outbreak I want to cancel my ticket. I called Air India, they said that they can’t cancel or schedule and that the agent has to contact them. But Travelgenio is not reachable. You cannot call them and they don’t respond to emails. What to do!

Giving us a generic response to your terms and conditions is not helpful. This has been a good lesson to travellers across the world. We bought tickets from you as they were cheaper. This was a huge mistake! If we had booked through the airline, we would have gotten our money back. You are indeed a scam. https:/…www.travelgenio.comRead the reviews there. You do not. contact people even if their flight is leaving within 72 hours and/or refund does not come through even if you say it is processed.
any further info or details will be provided as a reply to registered queries in our online form. Thanks in advance

I have done that as well.How about Request No 3363123, 3357544. You have not responded to that as well.I have1. Written an email to customer.service@travelgenio.com2. Raised 2 tickets: 3363123, 33575443. Called several times only to not be connected to any agent Tell me, how is a customer supposed to be assured that her money will come back?

I have written to customer.service@travelgenio.com. I have raised two requests (3363123, 3357544) online on your website. I have called several times. How can I be assured that I will get a callback?Tell me, how is a customer supposed to be assured that her money will come back?
Thank you for contacting us Vijayalakshmi Shankar. One of our agents will contact you within the next few days. Best regards.

As per my best knowledge Air India providing full refund only for mist affected regions like italy china Japan iranFor other regions they are offering rescheduling without any add charges but with fare difference to be paid

Im sure you are hurting and not happy going by your post but the question you are asking are they a scam. In.the last 3 years i have booked numerous flights with them and only had 1 problem. That problem was actually my own fault making a mistake on my booking. I contacted these guys through messenger and they could not have been any more helpfull. Like everyother company they will be innundated with messages. Good luck anyway.
If you paid for the trip through a credit card, consider contacting your credit card company to ask for advice.
